data.title: Tom Cruise Age, Bio and Net worth
data.meta_description: Tom Cruise Net Worth: Tom Cruise is a Hollywood actor. Another name of tom cruise is Thomas Cruise.
data.text:
Tom Cruise Net Worth: Tom Cruise is a Hollywood actor. Another name of tom cruise is Thomas Cruise. His born name is Thomas cruise. His date of birth is July 3, 1962. Tom Cruise is an American actor and producer. Tom Cruise is the world’s highest paid actor. He received many awards. Tom Cruise received various accolades and Honorary Palme and three Golden Globe Awards, in addition to nominations for four Academy Awards. His films have grossed over $4 billion in North America & over $11.5 billion worldwide. He is highest grossing box office star of all time.

Tom Cruise Acting Career

Tom Cruise start acting in 1980 and made his breakthrough with leading roles in the comedy film like Risky Business (1983) & action film Top Gun (1986). Critical acclamation came with his roles in the dramas The Color of Money (1986), Rain Man (1988) & Born on the Fourth of July (1989).

Tom Cruise starred science fiction and action films, establishing himself as an action star, often performing his own risky stunts. He has played Ethan Hunt in all six of the Mission Impossible series (1996-2018). Vanilla Sky (2001), Minority Report (2002), the Last Samurai (2003), Collateral (2004), War of the Worlds (2005), Knight and Day (2010), Jack Reacher (2012), Oblivion (2013), Edge of Tomorrow (2014) and Top Gun: Maverick (2022).

Tom Cruise Age, Bio and Net Worth

Early life and education

Tom Cruise was born on July 3, 1962 in Syracuse, New York, electrical engineer Thomas Cruise Mapother III (1934-1984) and special education teacher Mary Lee (1936-2017). His parents both were from Louisville, Kentucky, & English German, and Irish ancestry. 3 sisters, Lee Anne, Marian and Cass. Tom Cruise’s cousins William Mapother is an actor who has appear alongside tom cruise in five films. He grew up in poverty & had a Catholic upbringing.

Tom Cruise described his father as “a merchant of chaos” a “bully” and “coward” who tired his children. He explained, “My father” was the kind of person, if something goes wrong, they kick you. It was a great lesson in my life, how he’d lull you in make you feel safe and then bang. For mem it was like, There is something wrong with this guy. Don’t trust him. Tom Cruise’s biological father died of cancer in 1984.

Tom Cruise Schools History

Tom Cruise Change 15 schools in 14 years. He spent part of his childhood life in Canada, when his father took a job as a defense consultant with the Canadian Armed Forces, his family moved in late 1974 to Beacon Hill, Ottawa. He joined the fresh Robert Hopkins Public School for his 4th and 5th grade education. He involved in drama 1st time in fourth grade under drama teacher George Steinburg. In grade six he went to Henry Munro Middle School in Ottawa. He went on to star in the school’s production of Guys and Dolls. In 1980 he progressed from Glen Ridge High School in Glen Ridge, New Jersey.

Production of Tom Cruise

Tom Cruise develop partner with his previous ability proxy Paula Wagner to form Cruise/Wagner Manufactures in 1993. His co-produced several films like Mission: Impossible in 1996 which was also Cruise’s first project as a producer.

Cruise has created numerous movies in which he looked. He produced like, Mission: Impossible, Without Limits, Mission: Impossible 2, The Others, Vanilla Sky and many others.

Personal Life and Relationships

Tom Cruise goodbyes his period amid homes in Beverly Hills, /California, Clearwater, Florida, and the south of England stayed Cruise has survived in numerous residences counting middle Landon, Dulwich, East Grinstead and Biggin Hill.

Tom Cruise had relationships with Melissa Gilbert, Rbecca De Mornay, Patti Scialfa and Cher.

Cruise married with actress Mimi Rogers on May 9, 1987 and divorced on Feb 4, 1990. Tom Cruise 1st wife is Mimi Rogers.

Cruise second wife, actress Nicole Kidman, their first film Days of Thunder (1990). They married on December 24, 1990 and divorced 2001.

Tom Cruise third wife, Katie Holmes (m. 2006; div. 2012)​

FAQs about Tom Cruise:

Q: What is Tom Cruise’s full name?

Tom Cruise’s complete name is Thomas Cruise Mapother IV.

Q: When was Tom Cruise born?

Tom Cruise was born on July 3, 1962, in Syracuse, New York.

Q: What is Tom Cruise’s height?

Tom Cruise is 5 feet 7 inches tall.

Q: What is Tom Cruise’s religion?

Tom Cruise is a Scientologist.

Q: What are some of Tom Cruise’s most famous movies?

Some of Tom Cruise’s most famous movies include:

Top Gun (1986)

Mission: Impossible (1996)

Jerry Maguire (1996)

Eyes Wide Shut (1999)

Minority Report (2002)

The Last Samurai (2003)

War of the Worlds (2005)

Rock of Ages (2012)

Edge of Tomorrow (2014)

Mission: Impossible – Fallout (2018)

Q: How many Academy Award nominations does Tom Cruise have?

Tom Cruise has three Academy Award nominations: Best Actor for Jerry Maguire (1996), Best Supporting Actor for Born on the Fourth of July (1989), and Best Picture for Rain Man (1988).

Q: What is Tom Cruise’s net worth?

Tom Cruise’s net worth is estimated to be $600 million.
